title: R1 Groove
description: R1 Groove gives you a smart and elegant metallic watch face with bold blue crystals.Key Features:✔ Battery Indicator✔ Month and Day✔ Day of WeekPlease note that this has only been tested on circle faces. Please do not leave bad rating, work with us to fix the issues and make a better quality product.
descriptionHTML:
R1 Groove gives you a smart and elegant metallic watch face with bold blue crystals.

Key Features:
✔ Battery Indicator
✔ Month and Day
✔ Day of Week

Please note that this has only been tested on circle faces. Please do not leave bad rating, work with us to fix the issues and make a better quality product.
comments: Good It works, its free, its great. Don't pay for watch faces.
Great Watch Face I really like the look of this watch face. Would you be able to do an Avengers watch face and Knight Rider watch face.
recentChanges: - You can now customise using Mobile Companion App
